Title: Relates to sex offender registration and residency restrictions
Summary: Relates to sex offender registration and residency restrictions; sets limitations on the distance sex offenders may be required to live apart from certain areas.
LawCode: Amd §§168-h, 168-n & 168-o, rel §168-w to be §168-x, add §168-w, Cor L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to sex offender registration and residency restrictions
